Judul: THE HOLIDAY EFFECT IN ASIA MAJOR INDEXES YEAR 2000-2009
Abstrak: This paper will use t-test to compare the mean return before and after the holiday for each index using their daily price by using SPSS as the calculating software. The result of this research is holiday effects occur in some countries based on which major holiday that certain Asia countries celebrate. Understanding about the occurrences of holiday effects in Indonesia will help investors to get more money by understanding more about time to buy and sell of their country specific indexes.
Kata Kunci: Capital market, index, return, holiday effect
Staf Input/Edit:
